entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Makkovik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:51 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Makkovik Airport 4:10 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -4.6°C
Wind: NNW 42 km/h gust 58 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 8. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023
